languages.text: "Нет". {n}Одно короткое тихое слово преисполнено непреклонности.{/n} "Мои поиски явили след Немезита. Без моих трудов он ускользнул бы от вас и затаился в тенях, копя силы для нового удара. Потому это моя охота и моя добыча. Коль не желаешь, чтобы я помогала тебе, — так прогони". {n}Вокс отключается.{/n}

"No." {n}The single short word is filled with unyielding resolve.{/n} "It was my searching that revealed the trail of Nemesite. Without my labours, he would have continued to elude you and remained lurking in the shadows, gathering his strength for another strike. It is my hunt and my prey. If you do not wish for my assistance, then banish me." {n}The vox shuts off.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Нет". {n}Одно короткое тихое слово преисполнено непреклонности.{/n} "Мои поиски явили след Немезита. Без моих трудов он ускользнул бы от вас и затаился в тенях, копя силы для нового удара. Потому это моя охота и моя добыча. Коль не желаешь, чтобы я помогала тебе, — так прогони". {n}Вокс отключается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "No." {n}The one short word is filled with unyielding determination.{/n} "It was my quest has revealed the trail of Nemesite. Without my labours, he would elude you and lurk in the shadows, gathering strength for another strike. Therefore it is my hunt and my prey. If you do not wish me to assist you, then banish me." {n}The vox-caster shuts off.{/n}

languages.text: "Nein." {n}Unnachgiebige Entschlossenheit steckt in diesem einzelnen, kurzen Wort.{/n} "Meine Suche hat Nemesits Spur zutage gefördert. Ohne mein Wirken wäre er Euch entkommen, er könnte weiterhin im Schatten lauern und Kraft für den nächsten Schlag sammeln. Das ist meine Jagd und meine Beute. Solltet Ihr meine Unterstützung nicht wollen, dann verbannt mich." {n}Das Vox verstummt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No." {n}The single short word is filled with unyielding resolve.{/n} "It was my searching that revealed the trail of Nemesite. Without my labours, he would have continued to elude you and remained lurking in the shadows, gathering his strength for another strike. It is my hunt and my prey. If you do not wish for my assistance, then banish me." {n}The vox shuts off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nein." {n}Unnachgiebige Entschlossenheit steckt in diesem einzelnen, kurzen Wort.{/n} "Meine Suche hat Nemesits Spur zutage gefördert. Ohne mein Wirken wäre er Euch entkommen, er könnte weiterhin im Schatten lauern und Kraft für den nächsten Schlag sammeln. Das ist meine Jagd und meine Beute. Solltet Ihr meine Unterstützung nicht wollen, dann verbannt mich." {n}Das Vox verstummt.{/n}

languages.text: «No». {n}Es una sola palabra, pero henchida de una determinación irreductible.{/n} «He sido yo quien ha hallado el rastro de Nemesitio. Sin mis esfuerzos, habría continuado eludiéndole y seguiría al acecho entre las sombras, recobrando sus fuerzas para lanzar una nueva ofensiva. Es mi cacería y mi presa. Si no requiere mi ayuda, destiérreme». {n}El voco se corta.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No." {n}The single short word is filled with unyielding resolve.{/n} "It was my searching that revealed the trail of Nemesite. Without my labours, he would have continued to elude you and remained lurking in the shadows, gathering his strength for another strike. It is my hunt and my prey. If you do not wish for my assistance, then banish me." {n}The vox shuts off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No». {n}Es una sola palabra, pero henchida de una determinación irreductible.{/n} «He sido yo quien ha hallado el rastro de Nemesitio. Sin mis esfuerzos, habría continuado eludiéndole y seguiría al acecho entre las sombras, recobrando sus fuerzas para lanzar una nueva ofensiva. Es mi cacería y mi presa. Si no requiere mi ayuda, destiérreme». {n}El voco se corta.{/n}

languages.text: 「ダメ」{n}その短い一言に、折れない決意が込められている。{/n}「ネメサイトの痕跡を見つけたのは私の捜索よ。私の苦労がなければ、彼はあなたから逃れ続け、影に潜み、次の攻撃のために力を蓄えたままだったでしょう。これは私の狩りで、アイツは私の獲物なの。私の力を望まないのなら、私を追放したらいい」{n}音声が途切れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No." {n}The single short word is filled with unyielding resolve.{/n} "It was my searching that revealed the trail of Nemesite. Without my labours, he would have continued to elude you and remained lurking in the shadows, gathering his strength for another strike. It is my hunt and my prey. If you do not wish for my assistance, then banish me." {n}The vox shuts off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ダメ」{n}その短い一言に、折れない決意が込められている。{/n}「ネメサイトの痕跡を見つけたのは私の捜索よ。私の苦労がなければ、彼はあなたから逃れ続け、影に潜み、次の攻撃のために力を蓄えたままだったでしょう。これは私の狩りで、アイツは私の獲物なの。私の力を望まないのなら、私を追放したらいい」{n}音声が途切れた。{/n}

languages.text: “不行。”{n}这两个简简单单的字，充满了不屈不挠的决心。{/n}“正是由于我的搜查，我们才发现了涅墨斯特的踪迹。如果没有我的努力，他会继续躲在阴影之中积蓄力量，再次发动袭击。这是我的猎物，这场狩猎属于我。如果你不需要我的帮助，那就把我赶走吧。”{n}音阵频道关闭了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No." {n}The single short word is filled with unyielding resolve.{/n} "It was my searching that revealed the trail of Nemesite. Without my labours, he would have continued to elude you and remained lurking in the shadows, gathering his strength for another strike. It is my hunt and my prey. If you do not wish for my assistance, then banish me." {n}The vox shuts off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不行。”{n}这两个简简单单的字，充满了不屈不挠的决心。{/n}“正是由于我的搜查，我们才发现了涅墨斯特的踪迹。如果没有我的努力，他会继续躲在阴影之中积蓄力量，再次发动袭击。这是我的猎物，这场狩猎属于我。如果你不需要我的帮助，那就把我赶走吧。”{n}音阵频道关闭了。{/n}

languages.text: « Non. » {n}Ce seul mot, si bref soit-il, est empreint d'une détermination implacable.{/n} « Ce sont mes recherches qui nous ont permis de remonter la piste de Némésite. Sans moi, il aurait continué à vous échapper et à sévir dans l'ombre, en rassemblant ses forces pour une nouvelle attaque. C'est ma chasse, et ma proie. Si vous ne voulez pas de mon aide, vous n'avez qu'à me bannir. » {n}La transmission-vox s'interrompt abruptement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No." {n}The single short word is filled with unyielding resolve.{/n} "It was my searching that revealed the trail of Nemesite. Without my labours, he would have continued to elude you and remained lurking in the shadows, gathering his strength for another strike. It is my hunt and my prey. If you do not wish for my assistance, then banish me." {n}The vox shuts off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Non. » {n}Ce seul mot, si bref soit-il, est empreint d'une détermination implacable.{/n} « Ce sont mes recherches qui nous ont permis de remonter la piste de Némésite. Sans moi, il aurait continué à vous échapper et à sévir dans l'ombre, en rassemblant ses forces pour une nouvelle attaque. C'est ma chasse, et ma proie. Si vous ne voulez pas de mon aide, vous n'avez qu'à me bannir. » {n}La transmission-vox s'interrompt abruptement.{/n}

languages.text: "Hayır." {n}Ağzından çıkan kısacık tek bir söz, yılmaz bir kararlılıkla dolu.{/n} "Nemezit'in izini açığa çıkaran benim araştırmamdı. Benim emeğim olmasaydı elinden kaçıp gölgelerde gizlenmeyi sürdürecekti. Başka bir saldırı için gücünü toplayacaktı. Bu benim avım, o da benim kurbanım. Eğer ki yardımımı istemiyorsan beni azat et." {n}Voksun sesi kesiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No." {n}The single short word is filled with unyielding resolve.{/n} "It was my searching that revealed the trail of Nemesite. Without my labours, he would have continued to elude you and remained lurking in the shadows, gathering his strength for another strike. It is my hunt and my prey. If you do not wish for my assistance, then banish me." {n}The vox shuts off.{/n}
